layman_description: A metal tool for fixing and crafting mechanical items.
technical_description: Tool item with repair interaction class and durability-based quality.
player_impact: Required to repair mechanical devices in your base.

layman_description: A heavy striking tool for building and breaking blocks.
technical_description: Construction tool with break-speed multiplier and damage output.
player_impact: Faster at breaking blocks than picking them up by hand.

layman_description: A digging tool that removes dirt and sand faster than hands.
technical_description: Tool with excavation speed modifier and soil interaction class.
player_impact: Quickly removes soil blocks for tunneling or farming.

layman_description: A mining tool that extracts ore and stone blocks efficiently.
technical_description: Tool with ore extraction speed bonus and hard-material affinity.
player_impact: Much faster at mining ore and stone than hands.

layman_description: A chopping tool that cuts wood and tree logs.
technical_description: Tool with wood-cutting speed modifier and harvest bonus.
player_impact: Quickly harvests wood and tree resources.

layman_description: A rod used to catch fish from water.
technical_description: Tool item with fishing interaction and catch-rate modifier.
player_impact: Allows you to fish for food in water bodies.

layman_description: A handheld light source you carry to illuminate dark areas.
technical_description: Light-source tool with radius property and fuel consumption.
player_impact: Lights up your surroundings at night and in caves.

layman_description: A tool that lets you open locked containers and doors.
technical_description: Utility tool with lock-breaking interaction and success probability.
player_impact: Opens locked chests and safes to get valuable items inside.

layman_description: A collection of small tools needed to craft items at workbenches.
technical_description: Utility item that unlocks crafting recipes and quality bonuses.
player_impact: Required to craft most items at your workbench.

layman_description: Lenses that let you see far away and identify distant objects.
technical_description: Tool with zoom capability and distance-viewing enhancement.
player_impact: Spotting distant points of interest before traveling.
